nodes.speaker: Village Elder
nodes.text: Welcome, traveler. Our village is in danger.

nodes.speaker: Village Elder
nodes.text: Dark creatures have invaded the caves to the north. We need a brave soul to investigate.

nodes.speaker: Village Elder
nodes.text: Safe travels then. Return if you change your mind.

nodes.speaker: Village Elder
nodes.text: Thank you! Take this healing potion. The cave entrance is to the north.

nodes.speaker: Village Elder
nodes.text: I understand. But please, reconsider. We have little time.
